resources.string: App Toolkit
Welcome to App Toolkit: Your Essential Android Companion

Step into a seamlessly optimized Android experience. App Toolkit is meticulously designed to unlock the full potential of your device, transforming everyday interactions into moments of efficiency and delight. Discover a powerful suite of intuitive tools crafted to simplify your digital life.
Unlock Core Functionality: Power at Your Fingertips

Dive into the essential tools that form the bedrock of App Toolkit. From streamlining routine tasks to enhancing performance, each feature is engineered for maximum utility and ease of use. Empower yourself with intelligent solutions designed to make your Android device truly work for you, every single day.
Tailor Your Experience: Personalization That Matters

Your Android experience should reflect you. App Toolkit offers a rich array of personalization settings, allowing you to fine-tune every aspect to match your unique preferences and workflow. Customize themes, notifications, and tool behaviors to create an environment that feels uniquely yours and evolves with your needs.
Failed to fetch apps
What is Cart Calculator?
Cart Calculator is a simple, generic and free shopping cart manager and total due calculator that replaces the ordinary device\’s calculator for when you are at the grocery store or at the market.
How does Cart Calculator work?

Cart Calculator allows you to manage your shopping cart by adding products and increasing or decreasing their quantities. At any time, the Cart Calculator displays the total due of the products in your cart based on their prices and quantities.
Why should I use Cart Calculator?
Cart Calculator helps you to always be aware of how much you’re spending even before reaching the checkout. This is especially useful for when you have to go shopping on a budget.
Can I use Cart Calculator outside of grocery stores or markets?
Yes! Since Cart Calculator is shockingly simple and generic, you can also use it in pubs, restaurants, the movies etc.
How do I add an item to my cart using Cart Calculator?
Open your cart and press the \"Add item\" button in the Action Bar to add a new product to your cart. You inform its name, price and quantity and then click on the \"Add\" button.
How do I increase or decrease the quantity of an item in my cart using Cart Calculator?
Simply find the item in the list and then press the \"+ (plus)\" button to increase its quantity or the \"- (less)\" button to decrease its quantity.
How do I remove an item from my cart using Cart Calculator?
To remove a product from your cart, simply swipe right or left or drop its quantity to zero and then select the \"Delete item\" button.
Is Cart Calculator free software?
Yes! Cart Calculator is proudly free software distributed under the GNU General Public License version 3.
How can I contribute to Cart Calculator?

The best way to contribute to Cart Calculator is through its GitHub repository. From there, you can fork it and work on your contributions, and later send them back via pull request. You can also use the issue tracker to report bugs, propose new features or enhancements, or get ideas for how you could help.
